attributes.action: Suspend VAT on all hot takeaway food during the Covid-19 outbreak.
attributes.additional_details: To help the catering industry during this very challenging period and the general public by reducing the cost of take away food.
attributes.background: Currently, all hot take away food is subject to VAT at the standard rate (20%). This should be suspended for the duration of the Pub/Restaurant/Cafe shutdown in the UK. This will immediately reduce the price of all take away orders by 20% without impacting the business selling the food.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304245

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
